# @nis2shield/react-guard - AI Context

## What is this library?
A React library for NIS2 Directive compliance on the frontend.
Provides session protection, security telemetry, and encrypted storage.

## Core Components
- `<SessionWatchdog>` - Idle timeout, auto-logout, tab napping protection
- `<AuditBoundary>` - Error boundary that reports crashes to SIEM
- `<SecurityBanner>` - Warns about insecure connections/browsers

## Core Hooks
- `useSecureStorage(key, initial)` - AES-GCM encrypted localStorage
- `useSecureInput({ type })` - Hardened input field props
- `useDeviceFingerprint()` - Session hijacking detection
- `useNis2Log()` - Report custom security incidents

## Typical Setup
```tsx
<Nis2Provider config={{ auditEndpoint: '/api/telemetry/', idleTimeoutMinutes: 15 }}>
  <AuditBoundary fallback={<LockScreen />}>
    <SessionWatchdog onIdle={() => logout()} />
    <App />
  </AuditBoundary>
</Nis2Provider>
```

## Backend Integration
Pair with `django-nis2-shield` (Python) or `@nis2shield/express-middleware` (Node.js).
Telemetry is sent to `auditEndpoint` as JSON.

## NIS2 Articles Addressed
- Art. 21.2.h: Session management, inactivity timeouts
- Art. 21.2.j: Security monitoring and logging
